p: The patients will also benefit from PET-CT exams before treatment. PET1 F-Choline, NaF and FDG are standard examinations for metastases staging; and PET2 FDG or F-Choline for evaluation. If NaF-PET cannot be done, patients will have a “conventional” biphosphonates SPECT-CT with a tomographic exploration from the vertex to mid-thigh in double or triple field instead.
